channel.title: Hoodconnection, 317 Summoning Development
channel.description:
[s][center][b]Skill's[/b] 100% Combat Includes the following: Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Prayer, Magic and Summoning wich also infects your combat level. 100% Runecrafting 75% Agility 80% Helblore 90% Thieving 100% Crafting 100% Fletching 80% Slayer 100% Mining 75% Smithing 100% Fishing 100% Cooking 85% Firemaking 100% Woodcutting 70% Farming 0% *Hunter (I'm not sure if i'm going to make hunter)
[b]Minigame's[/b] The Slave trader (Own made fun minigame, i may make a video) Castle wars Pest Control Improved Barbian assault
[b]Video's[/b] Wolf Whistle Quest: http://img26.imageshack.us/i/film0019.mp4/ Summoning monsters: http://nl.tinypic.com/r/346t1z9/4/[/center]
[center][b]Picture's[/b] [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/1162/000000000int.png[/img] (credits to Mitko)
[img]http://img119.imageshack.us/img119/7651/aaaaaaaaaaaa.png[/img]
[img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/4682/mmuffin1.png[/img]
[img]http://img49.imageshack.us/img49/4883/mmuffin2.png[/img]
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/1829/niggsz.png[/img]
[img]http://img129.imageshack.us/img129/8173/mogga.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/1161/59228587.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Support banner[/b] [IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6138/jjjjii.png[/img] [url=http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6138/jjjjii.png]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/6138/jjjjii.png[/url][/CENTER][/s]
Here is my new development http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,412938.0.html

item.title: Hoodconnection, 317 Summoning Development
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:53, topic:295635”][quote author=Deathspirit link=topic=391633.msg2953560#msg2953560 date=1252698671]

You should just put the images in an [ img][/ img] box… A little easier. :\

Gj on the 377 summoning btw… Awesome that you can follow tutorials and not fail at them, like 80% of the forum members. :x
[/quote]Yeah, yeah. I know about the [img] but i’m to lazy ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 01:52:28 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=391633.msg2949995#msg2949995 date=1252443860]
You should just put the images in an [ img][/ img] box… A little easier. :\

Gj on the 377 summoning btw… Awesome that you can follow tutorials and not fail at them, like 80% of the forum members. :x
[/quote] Yeah… I’m not sure about the following because it gets stuck somethimes >_< if you know a tut for it PM me a link if you can/want, thanks…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2009, 01:54:06 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=391633.msg2949995#msg2949995 date=1252443860]
You should just put the images in an [ img][/ img] box… A little easier. :\

Gj on the 377 summoning btw… Awesome that you can follow tutorials and not fail at them, like 80% of the forum members. :x
[/quote] Also… I didn’t follow tutorials well some… I do that when i’m bored >_< but for the summoning i used my own theories

I still prefer my own 317 summoning. ^^"[/quote]Hmm ok, i added some handlers to make it less laggy lol

item.title: Hoodconnection, 317 Summoning Development
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“nubster, post:49, topic:295635”]Goodjob dude![/quote] Thanks i’m thinking about changing some pictures now i changed much… My last update whas making the Summoning timer work wich dismisses your Summoning monster after 10 minutes, i added it also made it work with the interface ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 11:33:40 am[/size][hr][quote=“pkboy886, post:46, topic:295635”]snow… everywhere! i love it and is summoning 100%??? wow anyway good job dude :):)[/quote] Uh Summoning isn’t done yet and yes i like snow, i always can disable it >.< well i think the economy likes it :o[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 11:35:33 am[/size][hr][quote=“pkboy886, post:46, topic:295635”]nice work but it needs work what base did you use ?[/quote]Hmm as you mayby saw in the credits you see that it’s Deltascape based, and yes i did re-write alot things. Deleted uneeded stuff… I didn’t show alot of it, as i said i will add newer pictures soon :S

Read full topic
